PC Number: 2014-0966

Date: 2014-09-19

 

 

 

 

 

   His Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Prime Minister, pursuant to section 46 of the Parliament of Canada Act, appoints, effective September 19, 2014, for a period ending on September 18, 2015, each of the following Members of the House of Commons to be Parliamentary Secretary to the Ministers set out opposite the name of the Member:  

 

 

Member of the House of Commons

   

 

 

 

Minister(s) (Legal Title)

   

 

The Honourable Mike Lake

 

 

 

Minister of Industry

   

 

The Honourable Deepak Obhrai, to be styled Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Foreign Affairs and for International Human Rights  

 

 

 

Minister of Foreign Affairs

   

 
     

Gerald Keddy, to be styled Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of National Revenue and for the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency

 

Minister of National Revenue; Member of the Queenâ€™s Privy Council for Canada appointed by Commission under the Great Seal to be the Minister for the purposes of the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency Act

Minister of the Environment
